Name: Tapered Nail
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (cubes rather than a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Review: Rum takes over from Scotch as the base spirit in this riff on a Rusty Nail , but peated single malt adds interest and keeps it a true Nail (a cocktail with Drambuie and Scotch whisky).
History: Created in 2010 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Garnish: Pineapple wedge cut into nail-like shards
